Hvent updated this thing in a really long time, havent really seen the point.... 

Nothing really exiting has happened, i've been seeing much more of my boy scince he got his license, been comin up here, and meeting in the middle more. good fun. Lots of double dates with Emily and Karl.  good stuff, amusing conversations and situations (the blazer, the blue beast, high octane and big dub diesl, the drive in, westfield fair, and so much more to come right guys?!) um....... i guess thats it...

Volleyball is starting up again, try outs are on the 26 (Happy Birthday Alison!!!) and i have no idea what is going to happen. Sean (the coach) has changed things up a bit so if i dont make varsity (which i think is more likely than every one else) i probly wont make jv either. fun stuff... should be interesting!

I went to a mud volleyball thing on sat (the 21) that benifited the Elipsy Foundation of Conn. it was soo much fun, i didnt play because for some reason you have to be 18, but it was alot of fun watching my uncle and his team play. 
woot

well i guess thats it, luv ya'll
~kimmie

i regret to inform every one that i died in a drinking and driving accident last night in drivers ed. Until 9 pm tonight i cannot talk to any one, which is why i'm on the computer cause technically i'm not talking.... so i'm communicating with u from the dead. no joke. any way, whats up? i'm really bored and its only 10 am... blah, i hope sam gets online soon... i havent talked to him in 2 days, that feels like such a long time... well i guess thats it
~the hippo
if i can bondo, u can bondo~smitty

my birthday was awsome, def. one of the best yet. Here is how my bday week went:
mon-wed was kinda boring, planning "hilary's" party
thurs: awsome, the actual birthday. sam came over and brought me a dozen roses (i jumped him, in a way..) and a fish who i named fruit loop.then emily came and we went shopping for "hilary's" party. (milkshakes, chinese and cold pizza for lunch right guys) then sam and i hung out until drivers ed. 
fri: hilary's AND mine suprise bday party. it was much fun, THANK YOU EVERY ONE ESPECIALLY EMILY< IDK HOW U DID IT!!! sam and the boys got there late but it was fun when they got there. didnt get to tackle sam in the mustang but maybe next time.... the girls night... i'll just leave it at that
sat: went home then i went over to my favorite uncle's house went shopping with my aunt brenda where i got lots of cool stuff, then we went out to dinner with sam, which was so much fun then came back and watched starsky and hutch, god movie
sun: woke up breakfast, got picked up then went to the mall with the rent where i got slippers, prom dress, and winter coat.
woot woot

ttyl
luv to all
~the hippo

guess what.... i'm back! actually ive been back for awhile but i've been to lazy to update... so heres whats now:
i'm kinda tan, kinda
i learned how to play cribbage
i bonded with my cousins etc. 
i'm in drivers ed
my bday is 2morow
i'm worried about my friends
i saw sam on mon. :) i'm a happy camper
i'm gonna see him like 3 times this weekend
i miss nikita, and i wish i could talk to her, if any        one         knows a way i can, plz tell me
i miss a my family
i;m looking foward to my weekend

i guess thas about it, i get my permit 2morow, maybe
lluv toall
~the hippo

hey guys whatsup? blah blah blah... having fun out herre, its fun hangin out with my cousins, we are having a bnuch of parties for m grandparents because it is their 50th anniversary, pretty cools... had to dress up, went to this restuaraunt called Prospectors, HUGE portions, but really yummy... woohoo.. any way since people are watching me type and what im dong, plus im on a labtop and i really dont like not having a mouse.... im having breathing problems again, much fun... any way, i will talk to ya'll later... love u guys, gimmie a call on my dad's cell ophone if u have the number!
~the hippo

ok people, this is it, im off, in t-minus like an hour ill be at the hotel, and at 6 2morow morning i'll be on a plane (i know way to early, which basically means i have to wake up FRICKEN early sucks.. any way, i kno ill try and call at least some one, who can relay a message around to any one who wants it.... um.... bout it, ifi die in the plane crash, just come over and take my stuff, let sam have first choice tho (although i kno he <as well as the rest of the guys> will go right to the underwear) haha just kidding... who jsut give my sterio to the volleyball team, just every one know that i cared about them... sam i alays loved u... blah blah blah... um....yea, my dad will hve the lab top so i might go on for like 10 min and update this thing... but who really cares since no one really reads these things... i didnt see emily like i wanted to.... and i didnt see sam, which eally sucks because it will be 3 weeks to a month before i see him enxt, but i guess tat is ok, i hope he has fun on vaca any way... ttyl!
~the hippo

blah is my new favorite word, yay... (o yay) lol ANY WAY i leave 2morow, we are staying in a hotel 2morow night, (it has a pool that is open till midnight... i wonter if sam will want to come.... ) and the hotel is actually part of the air port so we just take a little bus thingy over and do our thing, much fun... 9i get to steal all the soap and shit at the hotel, im kinda exited) lol... um... it hasnt realy hit me yet. im eixted but i still cant believe that im gonna see my whole family again, its like.. wow.. yea i dkno...i hope i can see sam 2morow, we might meet at the mall, or if we dont do that then ill make the rents stop by his house that night for like 10 min. or some thing... i wonder what this trip is gonna be like, will it be like the last one? or different? idk... should be interesting tho....im so exited all my friends are turning 16!!!! and we are all getting permitts and licenses.. it seems so unbelieveable.. it seems like just yesterday we were all sitting around talking about what we are going to do when we get ou licenses, now its actually happeneing, like i got a ride hom from sam the other.. it was crazy! i never thought that would happen! we always talked about it, but i never thought that we would even last this long (this was only like 4 months in)and i thought he would have crashed by now, (hah jk hun) idk its weird...its crazy... wooooo... im gonna miss every one alot... :( blah.... o well, maybe ill update before i leave... maybe i wont... idk
~the hippo

im leaving in like 3 days for WA, much fun, my mother is gone all bitchy on me, its not happy in this house right now... blah, i want ice cream... ive ben cleaning my room the past 3 days, its like spotless, kinda scarey.... sam's baseball team made the finals! yay! i have to start packing and shit 2morow, blah....which means i cant wear any of the cloths im bringing, but i dont have that many cloths, so im kinda screwed, so im gonna walk around naked, LOL just kidding... i hope i get to see my sam before i go, im gonna miss every one, i kno its only 2 weeks but yea.... every one give me ure address so ican send u a post card or some thing like that...  um....idk nthing is really oing on.. i saw garfield with sam and josh, well "saw" garfield.. then that night i went and saw dodgeball with wayne, carey, carey's sister, her friend, this kid sean, and justin, it was fun, they were late so wayne and i chilled, and now im mentally scared..(does that make you happy? fuckin chuck norris) um.... yea, justin wayne and i made rude comment thru the movie, much fun... well thats all.. ttyl
~the hippo

good couple of days, krystin and i went to the mall yesterday and shopped and girl talked and it was fun.. and i can spell.. then.. today mother father and i went to the big mall to get stuff for wachington, (see i told u couldnt spell) it was fun shit, i was gonna meet sam the sexy man at the mall but i couldnt :( BUT i did go to his house after and we got to hang out for like 2-3 hours, YAYNESS im def. a happy camper right now, i needed that soo much, i was DYING... it was no nice just laying on the couch together... AND he drove me home!!!!! how cool is that? we had always talked about when he got his license he owuld drive me places and shit even tho hes not suposed to, and it actually happened, it was so weird... idk, its like every thing we all used to talk about, like getting permits, and licenses its all coming true... i mean ive had this vaca planned for months... and its finally coming up in a WEEK i wanna see every one before i go... if any one has any good book recomendations lemme know cause im gona be doing alot of reading while im there... god m jst so happy right now, its amazing how much that kid can change my mood, I LOVE HIM, woot well.. cyall lata
~the hippo
~the lost puppy with no brothers or sister left in the box

YAY im at kita's houe, woot! she is currently in school taking her last 2 finals, english and history... its been fun over herre in noho... um.. yesterday we hung out with Betty, and went to the hospital... the creepy old one in noho... it was really fun, i sketched myself out tho, in a way it felt good just cause i dont usually do that... um... what am i doing right now? im waiting till 10 so i can call sam and be like "bitch i havent seen u in a month.. ure comin ova!" haha, jk, but i am gonna make him come over... what else am i doing..? i am eating fruitloops and hoping butter buns and leelou (duno how to spell it) will eat them cause i dont wanna pick them up off the floor cause im lazy... i really miss sam, *sigh* idk if i updated on this but i went to the mall with my aunt heather, and her friend virginia (wolfram). it was fun, i got some capris cause heather bought them for me for my birthday.... um... started to get ready for this trip im takin.. i have to buy more stuff than i thought i would, RARGRRRRRRRRR i hate shopping....i like fruit loops tho....i feel soo fat right now, i didnt eat like all day tues. then i get here on wed. and kita makes me eat pizza, then i ate all this candy... i cant believe i wasted 3 dollars on food, blah, i hate eating, i hate food, i should never eat again, the only reason y i eat now is so i dont pass out... blah... i took seditives last night, but i still coudlnt sleep... i hate this... i woke up like 5 times, then i woke up at 6:30 or so cause kita got up then... i hate not being able to sleep... i hate not being hungry and forcing myself to eat....i like staying here, it gets my mind off of things, im still connected to the "real world" but in some ways im apart from every thing at the same time.... im goin to the movies 2night with ian, kita, krystin, alison, maybe this sean guuy, samuel and karl (maybe)i started reading the bel jar, its pretty good so far, i think ill like it....well alright, im done...  cya later
luv to all
~the hippo

we're juniors, how fuckin cool is that shit? yea i havent seen sam in 3 weeks... how many ways can we say that kimmie is dying?! no more school! school that counts any way... i think sam got his license today, yayness! m gonna try and hide it from my parents as long as possible... just so i can be like "yea.. sam's mom is picking me up" i cant wait to see that kid, OMG im gonna fuckin tackle his ass down... i miss him so much...
alot of my stress has been lifted since im done with finals... so i guess tahts cool.. i was feeling pretty good today... but as the day goes on and i dont really talk to any one, i feel worse and worse... 
i finally talked to some one about the way ive been feeling lately.. and then i talked to my parents... idk how they took it.. idk what they are doing about it, or if they are... today i felt really stupid about doing some thing, i felt alot better and shit... but idk, i guess im just gonna have to wait it out or some thing... i really have to talk to sam about it too... i know it doesnt directly involve him but idk, its kinda important so... yea... god, if i feel this bad after 1 day of not talking to any one (cept for emily for like 10 min on the phone, and ppl online) how am i gonna feel when im in WA? idk what im gonna do... im gonna miss every one so much, and im gonna miss sam, and emily, and hilly, and jackie, and kita.. and making fun of josh... imgonna have to spend 2 weeks with my parents.. ALONE some one, save me plz... blache... i hate this... im gonna go sleep now, maybe that will help some thing, who knows?
luv to all
~the hippo
kno what really bothers me? when ppl dont go idle after being away for so long, it really pisses me off... idk y, im just wierd like that

ALRIGHT ppls.... i wanted to do a lets hang out for last day of school thing.. maybe we can all put together $$ and i can make daddy go get us dunkin dounuts or somet hing... or go downtown and get pizza or some thing... comment or post some thing if ure itnerested...

finals finals finals... woofuckinghoo
*that should explain it all*
bio and french today, english and my last class with pro 2morow *tear* and i have another french class on mon. but IF sam gets is license this weekend, and we are ok i probly wont go, or i'll just waunder the halls or hang out in ms. varnon's room cause shes cool like that. (hey, she got me a muffin on wed. so she fuckin rocks in my book)all i kno is im NOT going to french...i hate that class...
other than that im really bored, im gonna start reviewing for french in a little while... case im basically screwed for that final...
i really miss sam, i know i say it in every post... but i havent talked to him in a week, i try calling him but i only get the machine, or his mom or sister, and idk if they tell him i called or not, but he never calls me back... is it just too uch effort to talk to me? im beggining to think that maybe he is avoiding me, or he hates me or some thing.... ive needed to tlzk to him about alot of stuff lately... and he hasnt been there... idk what to do again... im sick of crying about it RAR!
any way, they posted my poems on this web site, its really cool im wicked exited ANY WAY ill stop bitching and etc.
every one shouldnt care
~the hippo

WEEEEEEEEEEEEE UGH! its like bad sex! lmao, <me and hilary trying to teeter tooter.. see saw idk how to fuckin spell it but i busted my ass laughing so fucking hard! and..... TOILET random game is fun! condom... um...ed is the best pet stick i could ever hope for, hes such a great stick, i love him, yes o yes i do.. yes ure cute ed.... 
and the amazing part about all this, is that u all will read this, and not be scared... god i love my friends, lol... ANY WAY if ucouldnt tell the road trip was a success... AND i have a littl ebit of a tan YAYNESS and im kinda hyper if u couldnt tell... um.... i got a fish today! his name is midget II hes so cool...i think the whole moving from tank to plastic bad to tank kinda confused the poor kid, cause hes kinda swimming around aimlessly, maybe he is depressed, maybe i should get him som ezoloft, maybe not. who knows? um.... yea i havent talked or seen sam in a long time, i really need to talk/see that kid, life sucks w//o him... any way
yea
luv to all
~the hippo

i dont know what to do with myself any more... idk what to do for my friends, problems are just exceeding what i can handle, and idk how much more i can take
its like some one took a big spoon and jsut scooped out all of me, i have nothing left inside, all i feel is bad...
~the hippo

i dont see the point in this any more, no one really cares, no one makes comments... there really is no point.... i dant even say what i want to 1/2 the time cause im afraid that some one is gonna get all offended or some thing.... i sont see a point of any thing, all of my friend's problems should be put onto me so they can just be happy. kita is getting worse, and im scared for her... i want to KILL her mother... i hate her so fucking much, i hate britany warzonik or how everu spell that stupid slut's last name... she is such  a fucking slut, and whore and she just uses people. i hate how jackie and hilly wont stand up to her, maybe im just the only one who sees how much she uses people... if i EVER act like her, kill me
hell, kill me any way, it doesnt matter

daddy's graduation is 2morow, should be fun, im so proud of him, i cant believe how far he has come. <tear> yea, the water works are definatly going to be goin on my part 2morow, woot... unfortunatly, sam cant go, so i probly wont see him until next weekend. some times i wonder what he really thinks about me, like i ask him to tell me, but idk, i trust that it is mostly the truth and all, but idk.i feel like im dragging him down, i want to talk to him about it, butidk, its like i never get to talk to him any more. 1/2 the time i'm online waiting for him to get online cause i dont wanna call him and annoy him, and he never calls me. i just dont know what to do any more, i wonder if he thinks im dragging him down, i dont know any more, i dont know any thing. *sigh* he just never seems to be around, and i dont want to bother him or any thing, idk, maybe he just doesnt have the time any more, idk im gonna talk to him about it so i dont assume any thing. 

went to the relay for life with alison on fri. it was cool, she and i hadnt hung out in a wicked long time so good times... i saw a couple luminaries with names on them taht i recognized, kinda sad...

i really miss sam, i would give any thing to be with that kid right now, he probly doesnt care tho, but thats ok

luv to all,
the hippo

im kinda bored, and i havent updated so hell y not right? umm... school is annoying and some ppl are annoying me, idk maybe im just pmsing.... who knows... road trip is comin up and i doubt the guys are gonna be able to go, im sure every one is happy but im not. that would have been like my only chance ever to have a sleep over with sam... and it would have been really chill to hang out with every one... idk y im just not looking foward to it as much any more. i dont dont look foward to any thing any more, idk y... ive felt really depressed lately, and i want it to stop, when when im having a good day or some thing, i feel really guilty cause i kno my other friends arent. daddy is graduating this weekend, i cant wait, its gonna be fun, hopefully sam can go to the picnic sun. and i cant wait to give him his gift ;) lol... um... yea.. school is stressing and i feel totally unprepared for most of my classes... specially french and bio, not like i can do much, i dont even kno where to start. o well...
luv to all,
the hippo

many a family picnic this weekend, daddy graduates next weekend, woot. um... field trip to boston today, much fun, wayne is a dirty hoe, u kno... um... kinda depressed and lonely, as usual.... i really miss sam, i need a weekend wehre he like sleeps over waynes house one night or w/e and i can see him every day... i cant wait till we get older, then we can just be with each other whenever we want... but by that time he will get sick of me and drop me like a bad habit... but its ok, cause i am
luv to all
the hippo

umm alright couple of days... chilled with justin and wayne fri night, muchfun, parade w/ justin, bonding time, blah blah then wayne got here and we decided he was a whore so we went in the hot tub after we doodled on each other with highlighters in black light, woot

chilled with sam todya, much fun.. went golfing with him my grandfather this morn. agains, much fun, went and saw the day after 2morow, it was alrgiht, those movies wehre the world ends or it freezes or w/e are getting kidn of repetitive, idk just me
 
w/e fund day, daddy won $$ on a scratch ticket, woot
luv
me

emily and i hungout the other day, it was def. fun, lol right em? um... im stressing about bio and school a ton more cause i really wanna make the honor roll this quarter, id be on it all year, yay!! um... thats about it... i hate shorts, even tho sam looks sexy when he wears them, but he looks just as good, if not better in pants, cause i love a guy who can pull off a good lookin pair of jeans...
seinors had their last day today, i got water balloned, and they set the fire alarm off, good times. i cant wait till im a seinor, WE ARE GONNA RULE THE FUCKIN WORLD! woot
ttyl, luv,
me

ive come to some new conclusions... that i am not worth any of the people i hang out with, hilary, jackie, em, kita every one. i am not worth such great friends as all u are... 

even sam, i am definatly not worth him, he deserves so much more than i can give himits driving me insane that i cannot do more for him. in some ways, i want to let him go, but my other side keeps telling me to hold on just a little longer. god i love him so much, i should just do whats best for him, and for all of u.. i should jsut let go so i can stop hurting u all...

the world has gone to shit, and so have i
good bye
kp

im not sure what to do any more, i'm just going to study, forever... i gotta ace the final bio test or im screwed, i dont think i will tho... im so stressed about school, its not even funny... im exuasted all the time, idk what to do about it, i had more breathing porblems... nothing any one can do

i need to let go of every thing and stop dragging people down...especially the people who i love and care about most

i wish i could write better poetry, and better short stories...

i wish i had a different body, and a different mind

i keep spinning farther and farther down, im not sure what to do any more, should i seek help? but who...? should i just bottle things up until they disapear or go away? or do i find a wall and just ry and beat the crap out of it, and hurt myself...? or should i just hurt myself? i know i deserve to be hurt, but i dont know how....

i feel so hollow inside, why do i feel this way? 

i need to be stronger, i need to stop complaining about the little things that are wrong with me and suck it up and deal with them, i gotta make some desicions about my life and stick with them, i need to stop second guessing myself, i need to stop venting to people, they dont need to know my problems, and i should bother them with my problems...

i need to just leave, so u all can go on with your lives, and i can stop bothering you...

when you throw a penny into a foundtian, what do you wish for?
im really hyper right now, woooooooooooooo
im listening to cottonwood.. good  country band, woot
um.. saw samuel today... def. fun ;) lol any ways
jackie slept over, we saw SHREK 2 2ce, much fun... once with just us, and then another time with kita, logan his little friend and ian, woot
any way, that is all 
ttyl
luv,
me

MCAS has been all week long. i got so frustrated today with the math part of it, im such a fucking retard i had no idea what i was doing, and i got so confused. im not going to get my diploma, there is no way after todays test... im soo fucked so many people are going to be disapoined in me, idk if im gonna be able to take it...
i really miss sam, i know i always say that but idk its weird its more intense idk... ireally need him right now... o well... 
well thats it, nothing new
ttyl
luv,
me

i feel like a plague upon this earth, i cannot do any thign right, no matter my intentions, i jsut dont know what to do with myself lately. ive created a character in my writing and i make her do all the things that i want to do, and that i need to do... but i will never be able to do myself... pretty sad huh? ive been turning to substances more and more, in some ways i am scaring myself, but idk what else to do, it doesnt matter tho cause im such a light weight that a little bit will help.... the only person who can help me, doesnt live around here and i only get to see him (i think we al know who im talkin about now) once a week... i just dont know what to do any more... can some one tell me? i just cant figure this out on my own... im not sure how much im going to be able to take before i crack...
kita i ave to ask u a question remind me to ask u..
ive been under so much stress lately, that im having health issues...im not sure what to do about it...
luv,
me

yay!!! kimmie is off grounding! yiipee! not like there is any thing to do online any way lol
um.. yea MCAS sucks ass i think im doin ok so far tho, but tahts casue i at least kinda understand english... im gonna be fucked for the rest of it, woohoo!
um... idk what else to put
mrs. varnon (10th grade english teacher if u dont know) wants to put a poem that i wrote in the litercay journal, kinda wierd, idk if im gonna let her... hmmmm... i wish i could send one out to a magazine but i doubt that they woud put in it the magazine cause they are all really morbid and detailed, and i dont think they would want to put it in there... i need to find some one who wont judge me when i show them, and wont call a mental hospital, i love u all, but u guys rnt english teachers or poet people and cant critique it the way i need them to be. thye also cant know where i live so they dont cal a mental hospital...
well.... yea... its already tues. and i miss samuel sooo fuckin much... o well dont matter...
well then...
ttyl
luv,
me
